Projects

DailyDocket.org

A legal news service driven by user comments. Users develop and advertise their expertise on legal issues by adding valuable insight on current topics. Built on Rails.

Karaoke

A fun app for building party playlists. Uses YouTube API and a pre-made JSON array of lyric-friendly videos.

Nomsee!

Food photo sharing. For mobile and desktop. Built on Rails.

Donut Map

A fun project made over 2 weekends using Googles Maps API to Locate the nearest donut shops to you anywhere in the world. Written mostly in Javascript with some Ruby.
